statements: SELECT * FROM virtual_goods
SELECT id, product_name, price FROM virtual_goods WHERE inventory_count > 0
SELECT product_name, description FROM virtual_goods WHERE price < 50.00
SELECT product_name, inventory_count FROM virtual_goods ORDER BY inventory_count DESC
SELECT id, product_name, price FROM virtual_goods WHERE description ILIKE '%fun%'
SELECT product_name, price FROM virtual_goods WHERE inventory_count > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_goods WHERE price BETWEEN 20.00 AND 50.00 AND description LIKE '%electronics%';
SELECT id, product_name, inventory_count FROM virtual_goods WHERE description ILIKE '%sale%' AND inventory_count > 10 ORDER BY inventory_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_goods WHERE product_name IN ('T-shirt', 'Smartphone', 'Headphones') AND price < 100.00;
SELECT id, description FROM virtual_goods WHERE price >= 50.00 AND (description ILIKE '%special%' OR description ILIKE '%limited%') ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_goods;
SELECT * FROM virtual_goods WHERE price > 50;
SELECT name, price FROM virtual_goods ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, description FROM virtual_goods WHERE id = 3;
SELECT player_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM trading_transactions GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM virtual_goods WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, name, price FROM virtual_goods WHERE price < 100 AND name LIKE 'G%' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM virtual_goods WHERE description IS NOT NULL AND price >= 20 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT id, name, description, price FROM virtual_goods WHERE id IN (3, 7, 10) AND price BETWEEN 30 AND 60 ORDER BY id;
SELECT t.id, t.player_id, g.name AS goods_name, t.quantity FROM trading_transactions t JOIN virtual_goods g ON t.goods_id = g.id WHERE t.quantity > 10 AND t.transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM virtual_goods;
SELECT virtual_goods_name, virtual_goods_price FROM virtual_goods;
SELECT virtual_goods_name, virtual_goods_description FROM virtual_goods WHERE virtual_goods_price > 50;
SELECT * FROM player_auctions WHERE auction_start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT auction_id, auction_start_date, auction_end_date FROM player_auctions ORDER BY auction_start_date DESC;
SELECT virtual_goods_name, virtual_goods_price FROM virtual_goods WHERE virtual_goods_price > 100
SELECT * FROM trading_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT virtual_goods_name, virtual_goods_price, virtual_goods_description FROM virtual_goods WHERE virtual_goods_id = 3
SELECT auction_id, auction_start_date, auction_end_date FROM player_auctions WHERE auction_start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT seller_id, buyer_id FROM trading_transactions WHERE virtual_goods_id = 2 AND transaction_amount > 500
SELECT * FROM virtual_goods;
SELECT id, name, price FROM virtual_goods WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM trading_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, auction_id, player_id, goods_id FROM player_auctions ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE is_admin = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM virtual_goods WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, name, description FROM virtual_goods WHERE name LIKE '%sword%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM trading_transactions WHERE buyer_id = 100 AND seller_id = 200 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, player_id, goods_id, starting_price FROM player_auctions WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY starting_price ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE is_admin = TRUE ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_goods WHERE price > 100.00;
SELECT name, description FROM virtual_goods WHERE id = 2;
SELECT player_id, goods_id, quantity FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, email FROM players WHERE player_id = 5;
SELECT goods_id, starting_price, current_bid FROM auctions WHERE current_bid IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM virtual_goods WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_name, email FROM players WHERE player_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM auctions WHERE auction_end_date >= NOW() AND current_bid IS NOT NULL;
SELECT name, description, price FROM virtual_goods WHERE id = 3;
SELECT player_name, goods_id, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id = 15 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
